equalizer.cpp

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 
00011 #define TO_FILE
00012 #define USE_PRECODER
00013 
00014 #include "itpp/itcomm.h"
00015 #include "SISO.h"//SISO class
00016 #include "Progress_Timer.h"
00017 
00018 using namespace itpp;
00019 using tr::SISO;
00020 using tr::threshold;
00021 using std::cout;
00022 using std::endl;
00023 using std::string;
00024 
00025 int main(void)
00026 {
00027     //general parameters
00028     double threshold_value = 50;
00029     string map_metric="logMAP";
00030     ivec gen = "037 021";//octal notation
00031     int constraint_length = 5;
00032     int ch_nb_taps = 4;//number of channel multipaths
00033     int nb_errors_lim = 1500;
00034     int nb_bits_lim = int(1e6);
00035     int perm_len = pow2i(14);//permutation length
00036     int nb_iter = 10;//number of iterations in the turbo decoder
00037     vec EbN0_dB = "0:0.5:10";
00038     double R = 1.0/2.0;//coding rate of FEC
00039     double Ec = 1.0;//coded bit energy
00040 #ifdef USE_PRECODER
00041     ivec prec_gen = "03 02";//octal notation
00042     int prec_gen_length = 2;
00043 #endif    
00044 
00045     //other parameters
00046     string filename = "equalizer_"+map_metric+".it";
00047 #ifdef USE_PRECODER
00048     filename = "prec_"+filename;
00049 #endif
00050     filename = "Res/"+filename;
00051     int nb_bits_tail = perm_len/gen.length();
00052     int nb_bits = nb_bits_tail-(constraint_length-1);//number of bits in a block (without tail)
00053     vec sigma2 = (0.5*Ec/R)*pow(inv_dB(EbN0_dB), -1.0);//N0/2
00054     int nb_blocks;//number of blocks
00055     int nb_errors;
00056     bvec bits(nb_bits);//data bits
00057     bvec nsc_coded_bits(perm_len);//tail is added    
00058     bvec em_bits(perm_len);
00059     bmat parity_bits;
00060     ivec perm(perm_len);
00061     ivec inv_perm(perm_len);
00062     vec rec(perm_len);    
00063     //SISO equalizer
00064     vec eq_apriori_data(perm_len);
00065     vec eq_extrinsic_data;
00066     //SISO NSC
00067     vec nsc_intrinsic_coded(perm_len);
00068     vec nsc_apriori_data(nb_bits_tail);
00069     nsc_apriori_data.zeros();//always zero
00070     vec nsc_extrinsic_coded;
00071     vec nsc_extrinsic_data;
00072     //decision
00073     bvec rec_bits(nb_bits_tail);    
00074     int snr_len = EbN0_dB.length();
00075     mat ber(nb_iter,snr_len);
00076     ber.zeros();
00077     register int en,n;
00078     
00079     //CCs
00080     Convolutional_Code nsc;
00081     nsc.set_generator_polynomials(gen, constraint_length);
00082 #ifdef USE_PRECODER
00083     Rec_Syst_Conv_Code prec;
00084     prec.set_generator_polynomials(prec_gen, prec_gen_length);
00085 #endif
00086 
00087     //BPSK
00088     BPSK bpsk;
00089     
00090     //AWGN
00091     AWGN_Channel awgn;
00092     
00093     //multipath channel impulse response (Rayleigh fading) with real coefficients
00094     vec ch_imp_response(ch_nb_taps);
00095     vec ini_state = ones(ch_nb_taps);//initial state is zero
00096     MA_Filter<double,double,double> multipath_channel;
00097 
00098     //SISO blocks
00099     SISO siso;
00100     siso.set_generators(gen, constraint_length);
00101     siso.set_map_metric(map_metric);
00102 #ifdef USE_PRECODER    
00103     siso.set_precoder_generator(prec_gen(0), prec_gen_length);  
00104 #endif
00105 
00106     //BER
00107     BERC berc;
00108 
00109     //progress timer
00110     tr::Progress_Timer timer;
00111     timer.set_max(snr_len);
00112            
00113     //Randomize generators
00114     RNG_randomize();
00115     
00116     //main loop
00117     timer.progress(0.0);
00118     for (en=0;en<snr_len;en++)
00119     {
00120         awgn.set_noise(sigma2(en));
00121         siso.set_noise(sigma2(en));
00122         nb_errors = 0;
00123         nb_blocks = 0;
00124         while ((nb_errors<nb_errors_lim) && (nb_blocks*nb_bits<nb_bits_lim))//if at the last iteration the nb. of errors is inferior to lim, then process another block
00125         {
00126             //permutation
00127             perm = sort_index(randu(perm_len));
00128             //inverse permutation
00129             inv_perm = sort_index(perm);
00130 
00131             //bits generation
00132             bits = randb(nb_bits);
00133 
00134             //convolutional code
00135             nsc.encode_tail(bits, nsc_coded_bits);//tail is added here to information bits to close the trellis
00136             
00137             //permutation
00138             em_bits = nsc_coded_bits(perm);
00139             
00140 #ifdef USE_PRECODER            
00141             //precoder
00142             prec.encode(em_bits, parity_bits);
00143             em_bits = parity_bits.get_col(0);
00144 #endif            
00145 
00146             //BPSK modulation (1->-1,0->+1) + multipath channel
00147             ch_imp_response = randray(ch_nb_taps);
00148             ch_imp_response /= sqrt(sum_sqr(ch_imp_response));//normalized power profile
00149             multipath_channel.set_coeffs(ch_imp_response);
00150             multipath_channel.set_state(ini_state);//inital state is zero
00151             rec = awgn(multipath_channel(bpsk.modulate_bits(em_bits)));
00152 
00153             //turbo equalizer
00154             eq_apriori_data.zeros();//a priori information of emitted symbols
00155             siso.set_impulse_response(ch_imp_response);
00156             for (n=0;n<nb_iter;n++)
00157             {
00158                 //first decoder
00159                 siso.equalizer(eq_extrinsic_data, rec, eq_apriori_data, false);//no tail
00160                 //deinterleave+threshold
00161                 nsc_intrinsic_coded = threshold(eq_extrinsic_data(inv_perm), threshold_value);
00162                 //second decoder
00163                 siso.nsc(nsc_extrinsic_coded, nsc_extrinsic_data, nsc_intrinsic_coded, nsc_apriori_data, true);//tail
00164 
00165                 //decision
00166                 rec_bits = bpsk.demodulate_bits(-nsc_extrinsic_data);//assume that a priori info is zero
00167                 //count errors
00168                 berc.clear();
00169                 berc.count(bits, rec_bits.left(nb_bits));
00170                 ber(n,en) += berc.get_errorrate();
00171 
00172                 //interleave
00173                 eq_apriori_data = nsc_extrinsic_coded(perm);
00174             }//end iterations
00175             nb_errors += int(berc.get_errors());//get number of errors at the last iteration
00176             nb_blocks++;
00177         }//end blocks (while loop)
00178 
00179         //compute BER over all tx blocks
00180         ber.set_col(en, ber.get_col(en)/nb_blocks);
00181 
00182         //show progress
00183         timer.progress(1+en);
00184     }
00185     timer.toc_print();
00186     
00187 #ifdef TO_FILE
00188     //save results to file
00189     it_file ff(filename);
00190     ff << Name("BER") << ber;
00191     ff << Name("EbN0_dB") << EbN0_dB;
00192     ff << Name("gen") << gen;
00193 #ifdef USE_PRECODER    
00194     ff << Name("prec_gen") << prec_gen;
00195 #endif    
00196     ff << Name("R") << R;
00197     ff << Name("nb_iter") << nb_iter;
00198     ff << Name("total_nb_bits") << nb_bits;
00199     ff << Name("nb_errors_lim") << nb_errors_lim;
00200     ff << Name("nb_bits_lim") << nb_bits_lim;
00201     ff.close();
00202 #else
00203     //show BER
00204     cout << ber << endl;
00205 #endif
00206 
00207     return 0;
00208 }
